mapper.select: SELECT N.NOTICE_ID, R.ROLE_ID, R.ROLE_NAME, N.TITLE, N.CREATED_AT, N.CATEGORY_ID, C.CATEGORY_NAME, N.IMPORTANCE, N.VIEW_COUNT, E.NAME FROM NOTICE N JOIN NOTICE_CATEGORY C ON N.CATEGORY_ID = C.CATEGORY_ID JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON N.EMP_ID = E.EMP_ID JOIN ROLE R ON E.ROLE_ID = R.ROLE_ID WHERE IMPORTANCE = 'Y' ORDER BY N.IMPORTANCE DESC, N.NOTICE_ID DESC

SELECT N.NOTICE_ID, R.ROLE_ID, R.ROLE_NAME, N.TITLE, N.CREATED_AT, N.CATEGORY_ID, C.CATEGORY_NAME, N.IMPORTANCE, N.VIEW_COUNT, E.NAME FROM NOTICE N JOIN NOTICE_CATEGORY C ON N.CATEGORY_ID = C.CATEGORY_ID JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON N.EMP_ID = E.EMP_ID JOIN ROLE R ON E.ROLE_ID = R.ROLE_ID WHERE IMPORTANCE = 'N' ORDER BY N.IMPORTANCE DESC, N.NOTICE_ID DESC

SELECT N.NOTICE_ID , R.ROLE_NAME , N.TITLE , N.CONTENT , N.CREATED_AT , N.VIEW_COUNT , N.NOTICE_FILE , N.CATEGORY_ID , C.CATEGORY_NAME , FD.DETAIL_ID , FD.FILE_ID , FD.FILE_NAME , FD.FILE_SAVENAME , FD.FILE_PATH , FD.FILE_STATUS , FD.FILE_SIZE , FD.FILE_TYPE , FD.UPLOAD_DATE , E.NAME FROM NOTICE N JOIN NOTICE_CATEGORY C ON N.CATEGORY_ID = C.CATEGORY_ID JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON N.EMP_ID = E.EMP_ID JOIN ROLE R ON E.ROLE_ID = R.ROLE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN FILE_DETAIL FD ON N.NOTICE_FILE = FD.FILE_ID WHERE N.NOTICE_ID = #{noticeId} ORDER BY N . CREATED_AT DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE ( NOTICE_ID, EMP_ID, TITLE, CONTENT, CATEGORY_ID, IMPORTANCE, CREATED_AT, VIEW_COUNT, NOTICE_FILE ) VALUES ( notice_seq.NEXTVAL, #{empId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=CLOB}, #{categoryId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{importance,jdbcType=CHAR}, SYSDATE, 0, #{oneFile,jdbcType=NUMERIC} )
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE SET IMPORTANCE = #{importance}, UPDATED_AT = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE NOTICE_ID = #{noticeId}
